messages.message: Getting this issue as well. In the logs I see some permission denied errors during the ECR pull

bumping this thread up. for the past week or 2, I've been having issues with restarting all services via `cs restart`. Typically i just resolve it by refreshing the workspace but it would be great if that's not the workaround and we can fix this via the CL

I did some debugging on @tony.shi’s sandbox, and it looks like the root cause is a status mismatch between the crafting daemon and the actual proccess.
```owner@dev:~/instabase/core-services/core-platform-service$ cs ps           
REPO      NAME                KIND            ENABLE PID   RESTART START    EXIT     STATUS ERROR
          bazel-remote        DAEMON          Yes    4268          21:33:29                      
instabase api-server          DAEMON          No                   21:33:29 21:58:45 Sig:9       
instabase celery-app-tasks    DAEMON          No                   21:33:29 21:58:45 Sig:9       
instabase control-plane       DAEMON          No                   21:33:29 21:58:45 Sig:9       
instabase conversion-service  DAEMON          No                   21:33:29 21:58:45 Sig:9       
instabase core-platform       DAEMON          No     61738 16      21:38:20 21:38:14             
instabase file-service        DAEMON          No                   21:33:29 21:58:45 Sig:9       
instabase job-service         DAEMON          No                   21:33:29 21:58:45 Sig:9       
instabase license-service     DAEMON          No                   21:33:29 21:58:45 Sig:9       
instabase model-service       DAEMON          No                   21:33:29 21:58:40 Sig:15      
instabase ocr-service         DAEMON          No                   21:33:29 21:58:45 Sig:15      
instabase search-service      DAEMON          No                   21:33:29 21:58:45 Sig:9       
instabase server-nginx        DAEMON          No                   21:33:29 21:58:45 Sig:9       
instabase table-service       DAEMON          No                   21:33:29 21:58:45 Sig:9       
instabase weaviate            DAEMON          No                   21:33:29 21:58:45 Sig:15      
instabase webapp              DAEMON          No                   21:33:29 21:58:45 Sig:9       
instabase webpack             DAEMON          No                   21:33:29 21:58:45 Sig:9       
instabase docker-system-prune JOB 0 */4 * * * Yes                                    Exit:0      
instabase ecr-login           JOB 0 */1 * * * Yes                  22:00:00 22:00:00 Exit:0      
instabase gcr-login           JOB 0 */1 * * * Yes                  22:00:00 22:00:00 Exit:0      
owner@dev:~/instabase/core-services/core-platform-service$ ps -p 61738
    PID TTY          TIME CMD
owner@dev:~/instabase/core-services/core-platform-service$ ```
Escelating this to the crafting people here: https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C03B865Q74K/p1746742633229529
AFAIK the only thing that’s changed over the last week is crafting itself - they did an upgrade last weekend
